iOS Developer @Aviary (part of the Adobe family) - New York, NY (Full-time, on-site)

Aviary, part of the Adobe family, is seeking a superb iOS engineer to join its Engineering team in New York, NY.

We’re a company that understands that product innovation comes from people innovation, and that’s why we invest in cultivating leaders throughout the organization. If you’re passionate about leading from where you sit, join us.

What you'll need to succeed

  • Strong understanding of the iOS platform
  • Ability to maximize the performance, aesthetics, and interactivity of iOS apps
  • Significant contribution to at least one app in the App Store
  • Understanding of best practices for software engineering
  • Exceptional problem-solving skills
  • Proficiency in multiple platforms and multiple languages
  • Both self-reliant and effective at collaborating with the larger iOS product and engineering team
  • Deadline-oriented, responsible, and reliable
Application Details:

We are committed to having a meritocratic, transparent and bias-free selection process that is inclusive to applicants from all backgrounds.

In order to proceed to the next stage of the interview process, we want to make sure that you are genuinely excited about Adobe and are able to solve the types of challenges we face.

Now, you have the opportunity of easily get picked for this role without being judged on your background or who you are.

To apply, email your interest to adobe@gapjumpers.me or take this technical challenge at https://www.gapjumpers.me/questions/adobe/qs-255/
